biography:
Paul Hébert, OC, CQ (born May 28, 1924 in Thetford Mines, Quebec, Canada) is a French Canadian actor. He was awarded the Officer of the Order of Canada on June 29, 1987 for his services to French Canadian entertainment and was made a Knight of the National Order of Quebec in 1994. He has appeared on numerous Quebec television series including 14, rue de Galais as the Delisle family patriarch.

name: Paul Hébert
